resources.string: Sorry! I have encountered an unexpected situation. That\'s my fault.
Move all blocks to the left
Move all blocks to the right
by moving them and putting them together. You can move them by clicking on the arrows
and all of them will move in same direction all the way until they hit something (e.g. a wall or another block).
Sorry, but some levels failed to load.
Are you sure to delete this level?
This level is definitely impossible. You may need to tweak your level.
Unable to solve this level within %d steps. Maybe raise your step limit?

Usage: Tap to choose an element from the palette, then touch the empty area to add the element.
 
 
 Step: Specify the level's step limit here.

 Save: Save the level so that it can be loaded later.

 Load: Load a previously saved level.

 Gen.: Generate a level, specifying number of steps and colors of blocks, as well as special elements present. Levels generated are guaranteed to be solvable. May take considerable amount of time, especially if step limit is high.

 Solve: Solve the currently shown level within specified step limit. May take considerable amount of time, especially if step limit is high.

 Play: Play the currently shown level.

 Menu: Back to game menu.

[Enter here how you break Tiltblocks, and provide as much detail as possible so that we can fix it promptly, thank you.]
